description: Try our easy to follow Mushroom & Goat's Cheese Pizza recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mushroom & Goat's Cheese Pizza Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 250째C and preheat a pizza stone, if you have one. Knead dough again on a floured surface. Divide into 3 equal portions. Roll out each to a 20cm round and transfer to a pizza tray. Brush with remaining oil. Top with mozzarella, mushrooms and goat's cheese. Bake for 10 minutes or until golden and cheese has melted. Top with rocket to serve.
